title: Game Starting Issue (please help)
body:
"PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working 
A problem caused the program to stop working correctly. Windows will close the program and notify you if a solution is available."
Any fixes?

replies.body: Typically that kernel issue is caused when League isn't able to access certain files it needs to open normally. Double check this #[**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for some quick steps on how to make sure League has admin rights and you should be good to go.
